intro: Capraria undulata, commonly known as the undulating capraria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of the Americas. The plant typically grows as an annual herb with opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for garden cultivation in warm climates.
